dct:title: 1984 Tanzania 2m Temperature Yearly Average (Copernicus)
dct:creator: OHDSI
dct:description: A raster dataset with yearly averages of the 2m temperature from the Copernicus satellite sensors for Tanzania.
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp/{download,etl} && cd /data/tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# clone a git repo and run the code# save netcdf as tif
cd download
gdal_translate -a_srs EPSG:4326 tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp.nc tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp.tif
cd ..


#########
# Step 2 - SQL script (pseudo code):
####

# load raster into postGIS with:
    raster2pgsql -s 4326 -d -C -I tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp.tif -F -t 256x256 tz_1984_copernicus_avg_temp > load_raster.sql
psql <connection options> < load_raster.sql
rm load_raster.sql
dcat:contactPoint: University of Miami Libraries, Frost Institute for Data Science and Computing
gdsc:attributes: 2m_temperature;Average yearly 2m temperature in Kelvin from Copernicus reanalysis era5 sinagle levels;Copernicus;float;Kelvin
